subject: Order not delivered
description_text:
Hello,

I placed an order on amazon for Simsonn pedals. The order number is
111-1837877-4569807.
The order was supposed to be shipped to me at 1427 E. Route 66 Lebanon, Mo
65536 which is shown in the invoice as well. However, the track number
provided with fedex shows that it was delivered on the other side of the
country in New Oxford, PA. The fedex tracking number is 886368904940. I
would like to know where my order is, and how this will be fixed.

Thanks,
Kyle

conversations.body_text: Hi Kyle Dunn,  Your product has been shipped. The logistics number is:YT2533901400330693. You can track it at this website:https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=YT2533901400330693Â
